FEEP-MAPPING.SQL: SELECT id, username, password, sort, type, photo, studentcard, identitycard, birthday, tel, email, address, remarks, showname FROM feep_user
SELECT id, username, password, sort, type, photo, studentcard, identitycard, birthday, tel, email, address, remarks, showname FROM feep_user WHERE id = ?
SELECT id, username, password, sort, type, photo, studentcard, identitycard, birthday, tel, email, address, remarks, showname FROM feep_user WHERE username = ?
INSERT INTO feep_user(id, username, showname, password, sort, type, photo, studentcard, identitycard, birthday, tel, email, address, remarks) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE feep_user SET type = '-1' WHERE id = ?
UPDATE feep_user SET type = '-1' WHERE id in
DELETE FROM feep_user WHERE id in
